page.title: 13Political & Social
page.content: {Political The area seemed to be {evenly divided {politically.}Most families claimed no particular affiliation to any particular political party. 7 fathers and 7 mothers claimed allegiance to the Labour Party. 2 fathers and 3 mothers were members of the Social Democratic Party and 5 fathers and 5 mothers gave support to the Consvative Party. {Social 50 Households said that they did not use pubs or clubs frequently. 15 fathers said that they went to a pub or club alone and only 6 mothers said likewise.
